sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CloseIcon, SearchIcon, FilterIcon } from '../../utils/icons'; const BookNewGigsScreen = ({ artist, onClose }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('opportunities'); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [selectedFilters, setSelectedFilters] = useState({ genre: [], location: [], fee: 'all', date: 'all' }); // Sample opportunities data const opportunities = [ { id: 1, venue: 'Printworks London', event: 'Spring Opening 2025', date: '2025-03-15', city: 'London, UK', fee: { min: 6000, max: 8000 }, capacity: 3000, genres: ['Techno', 'Industrial'], status: 'open', deadline: '2025-01-20', requirements: 'Headline experience required', contact: 'bookings@printworks.co.uk' }, { id: 2, venue: 'Tresor Berlin', event: 'Underground Nights', date: '2025-02-28', city: 'Berlin, Germany', fee: { min: 3500, max: 4500 }, capacity: 800, genres: ['Techno', 'Minimal'], status: 'urgent', deadline: '2025-01-15', requirements: 'Vinyl preferred', contact: 'artist@tresor.de' }, { id: 3, venue: 'Space Miami', event: 'WMC 2025 Official', date: '2025-03-22', city: 'Miami, FL', fee: { min: 8000, max: 12000 }, capacity: 2500, genres: ['House', 'Tech House'], status: 'featured', deadline: '2025-02-01', requirements: 'WMC experience preferred', contact: 'talent@spacemiami.com' }, { id: 4, venue: 'Concrete Paris', event: 'Closing Weekend', date: '2025-04-05', city: 'Paris, France', fee: { min: 4000, max: 6000 }, capacity: 1200, genres: ['Techno', 'Experimental'], status: 'open', deadline: '2025-02-15', requirements: 'Long set preferred (6h+)', contact: 'booking@concrete.fr' } ]; const applications = [ { id: 1, venue: 'Amnesia Ibiza', event: 'Summer Residency', appliedDate: '2024-12-15', status: 'pending', response: 'Under review by talent team' }, { id: 2, venue: 'Movement Detroit', event: 'Main Stage', appliedDate: '2024-12-10', status: 'shortlisted', response: 'Proceeding to final selection' }, { id: 3, venue: 'Awakenings Festival', event: 'Area Y', appliedDate: '2024-12-05', status: 'rejected', response: 'Not suitable for this edition' } ]; const templates = [ { id: 1, name: 'Festival Application', description: 'Comprehensive application for festival bookings', lastUsed: '2024-12-01', successRate: 45 }, { id: 2, name: 'Club Night Proposal', description: 'Standard club booking template', lastUsed: '2024-11-28', successRate: 62 }, { id: 3, name: 'Residency Pitch', description: 'Long-term residency proposal', lastUsed: '2024-11-15', successRate: 78 } ]; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const statusClasses = { 'open': 'status-badge neutral', 'urgent': 'status-badge warning', 'featured': 'status-badge success', 'pending': 'status-badge pending', 'shortlisted': 'status-badge success', 'rejected': 'status-badge error' }; return statusClasses[status] || 'status-badge'; }; const formatFee = (fee) => { if (fee.min === fee.max) { return `$${fee.min.toLocaleString()}`; } return `$${fee.min.toLocaleString()} - $${fee.max.toLocaleString()}`; }; return (

Book New Gigs - {artist?.name}

{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Opportunities Tab */} {activeTab === 'opportunities' && (
{/* Search and Filter */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="search-input" />
{/* Opportunities List */}
{opportunities.map(opportunity => (

{opportunity.venue}

{opportunity.event}

{opportunity.status}
📅 Date: {new Date(opportunity.date).toLocaleDateString()}
📍 Location: {opportunity.city}
💰 Fee: {formatFee(opportunity.fee)}
👥 Capacity: {opportunity.capacity.toLocaleString()}
🎵 Genres: {opportunity.genres.join(', ')}
⏰ Deadline: {new Date(opportunity.deadline).toLocaleDateString()}
))}
)} {/* Applications Tab */} {activeTab === 'applications' && (

Your Applications

3 Total • 1 Pending • 1 Shortlisted • 1 Rejected
{applications.map(application => (

{application.venue}

{application.event}

Applied: {new Date(application.appliedDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{application.status}

{application.response}

{application.status === 'pending' && ( )}
))}
)} {/* Templates Tab */} {activeTab === 'templates' && (

Application Templates

{templates.map(template => (

{template.name}

{template.description}

Last used: {new Date(template.lastUsed).toLocaleDateString()} Success rate: {template.successRate}%
))}
)} {/* Quick Actions */}
); }; export default BookNewGigsScreen;
